channel.title: Client loading Bar?
channel.description: Hey guys, I am trying to change the text inside of the loading bar, but I do not know what class I need to edit. If anyone knows what I am talking about, can you help me out?

item.title: Client loading Bar?
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_Lulz Frozen Lulz
item.description:
@Frozen_Lulz wrote:

In client.java; ctrl + f;

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(

Look for something like this:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(128, "", 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2); int j = c1 / 2 - 18 - byte1; // Colours Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 152, 304, 34, 0xf5fffa, j, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method337(c / 2 - 151, 302, 32, 0, j + 1, true); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, c / 2 - 150, 0x778899, i * 3, 0); Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(30, j + 2, (c / 2 - 150) + i * 3, 0, 300 - i * 3, 0); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(0xf5fffa, s, 23693, (c1 / 2 + 5) - byte1, c / 2);

Read full topic
